text:
e="preserve">Gordon Williams (born 22 February 1929) is an English former footballer. He was born in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
Williams played as a centre forward in the Football League for Sheffield United and Darlington. He made five league appearances for each club and scored once, for Darlington, on 4 November 1950 in a 3–2 home win against Scunthorpe United in the Third Division North.
